issue.title: [C++] Win32 compatibility in file.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-610](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-610). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some work on this was done in a fork of Arrow: https://github.com/ray-project/arrow/commit/1f5b48d40ca5b685a9876c82260a4627f594a64a

It would be good to get tests for this functionality running in our Appveyor Windows continuous integration
